text: "Oj, svijetla majska zoro" (Cyrillic: 뤰, 혜쒫쟴떓왐햩햟 햪햟혲혜햨햟 향쮐; "Oh, Bright Dawn of May") is the national anthem of Montenegro adopted in 2004. It was a popular folk song with many variations of its text. The oldest version dates back to the second half of the 19th century.행햟햨쮏  햢햤햟쒫쫧쟳 혜햦햪햠쮏햦햪햟 햦 햢햟햫혞 햢햤햟쒫쫧쮐혝햦 햕햫햣 햅쮐햣 (2004). == Lyrics == Montenegrin Cyrillic Montenegrin Latin IPA transcription Metered English translation 洧 [틛oj s툶j칡틣t툹a m칙jska zro] 洧 洧 [m칙jko n칙툮a t포sr퍌팩틣na틣 토ro] 洧 洧 [s칥틣no툶칥 sm톖패 t툶칪틣토 stij캩틣쑈] 洧 洧 [i t포툮킚툶a틣ri t툶칪틣토 틛p톖툮t톝쑈] 洧 [툶뉅꾤m톖패 툶칙틣s 틛br퍌da t툶r팩틣da] [i str킕틣툶i틛t포툮쒟 틛va툮톝 k툶ant포s캩] [k뇱i틣 n칥kad ne 틛p톖z.na툮캩] [sram뇺n톖틣토a r뇷st툶a l킕틣n툮캩] 洧 [m칙jko n칙툮a t포sr퍌팩틣na틣 토ro] 洧 洧 [틛oj s툶j칡틣t툹a m칙jksa zro] 洧 洧 [m칙jko n칙툮a t포sr퍌팩틣na틣 토ro] 洧 [d칪k 틛lof t포톗칡nskoj n칙툮oj 틛misli] [n칙툮a sl칪토a 틛daje 틛krila] [b킗틣t포톗e 토칪틣rda b킗틣t포톗e sl칙틣툶na] [d뇴o툶ina n칙툮a m칥툹a] [rj캩틣ka t포톗e n칙툮칥x 툶킕la틣] [틛uska툮ut포톗e 틛u d툶칙틣 m뉆ra] 洧 [토l치틣s n뇹iti ok캩a틣nu] [틛da je 툶j칡t포툮no t포sr퍌팩틣na틣 토ra] 洧 [틛da je 툶j칡t포툮no t포sr퍌팩틣na틣 토ra] 洧 洧 O bright dawn of May blazes forth 洧 洧 Our mother Montenegro 洧 洧 We are the sons of your gravel 洧 洧 And guardians of your candour 洧 We love you, your craggy highlands And your magnificent gorges Which never came to experience The chains of shameful slavery 洧 Our mother Montenegro 洧 洧 O bright dawn of May blazes forth 洧 洧 Our mother Montenegro 洧 For the cause of our Lovchen Our unity gives us wings All proud and lauded shall we be Our dear homeland beloved Estuary of our waves That surges into the two seas 洧 Shall bear voice into the ocean That Montenegro is ageless 洧 That Montenegro is ageless == References == Category:European anthems Category:National symbols of Montenegro
title: Oj, svijetla majska zoro
